720588f-a.text:
Hudson Street, east side, from Abingdon Square to Horatio Street, showing 309-297 West 12th Street shortly before demolition of Nos.
309-299.
March 8, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
720588f-a.folder: Hudson Street & Horatio Street, Manhattan, NY

720449f-a.text:
Horatio Street, north side, from Hudson to 4th Streets, inclusive. The lot on the N.W. corner of Hudson Street, where No. 637 Hudson Street should stand, has been vacant for over twelve years at the time of this picture. It includes what would be No. 43 Horatio Street. The tall building at the N.W. corner of 4th Street is the RikerHegeman Building.
March 12, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
720449f-a.folder: Horatio Street & Hudson Street, Manhattan, NY

720449f-b.text:
Horatio Street, north side, from Hudson to 4th Streets, inclusive. The lot on the N.W. corner of Hudson Street, where No. 637 Hudson Street should stand, has been vacant for over twelve years at the time of this picture. It includes what would be No. 43 Horatio Street. The tall building at the N.W. corner of 4th Street is the RikerHegeman Building.
March 12, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
720449f-b.folder: Horatio Street & Hudson Street, Manhattan, NY

720450f-a.text:
Horatio Street, north side, from Hudson to Greenwich Streets, inclusive. The corner lot, occupied by the gas station, would be the site of No. 637 Hudson Street and 43 Horatio Street; it has been
vacant of buildings for a number of years.
March 29, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
720450f-a.folder: Horatio Street & Hudson Street, Manhattan, NY

720446f-a.text:
27-41 Horatio Street, at, adjoining and east of the N.E. corner of Hudson Street. Nos. 35-37 being a 1-story frame structure.
June 20, 1935.
L Sperr.
720446f-a.folder: Horatio Street & Hudson Street, Manhattan, NY

720448f-a.text:
Horatio Street, east from Hudson Street.
July 7, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
720448f-a.folder: Horatio Street & Hudson Street, Manhattan, NY
